metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29262 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: When starting Apache Solr versions prior to 8.8.2, configured with the SaslZkACLProvider or VMParamsAllAndReadonlyDigestZkACLProvider and no existing security.json znode, if the optional read-only user is configured then Solr would not treat that node as a sensitive path and would allow it to be readable. Additionally, with any ZkACLProvider, if the security.json is already present, Solr will not automatically update the ACLs.

criterions.comment: lucene-solr package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
